item.title: Three.js
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>使用three.js创建一个球</title> </head> <body> <script type="text/javascript" src="three.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript"> // 创建一个场景 var scene = new THREE.Scene(); // 创建
